resources.string: Welcome to Rehearsal Assistant. This is an early development version, please use with care.

Rehearsal Assistant allows you to record voice/audio annotations during an event. Such an event is called a \'run\' as in \'rehearsal run\'. Click \'Create New Run\' to create a new run and record annotations. You may also click on an existing run to review its annotations, or long-click for more options.
